languages.text: "Я... отметил эту особенность системы, да. Пока мне сложно сказать, как это связано с той, ради кого мы прилетели... и связано ли вообще". {n}Дознаватель явно избегает смотреть на Идиру.{/n}
"I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я... отметил эту особенность системы, да. Пока мне сложно сказать, как это связано с той, ради кого мы прилетели... и связано ли вообще". {n}Дознаватель явно избегает смотреть на Идиру.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我……已经注意到了这种系统性的特别之处，没错。不过，我不清楚这些事情与叫我们来这里的人之间有什么关系……说不定并不相关。”{n}很显然，海因里希不愿正视伊迪拉的目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我……已经注意到了这种系统性的特别之处，没错。不过，我不清楚这些事情与叫我们来这里的人之间有什么关系……说不定并不相关。”{n}很显然，海因里希不愿正视伊迪拉的目光。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Me he... percatado de las idiosincrasias del sistema, sí. Aún no puedo determinar qué relación tiene con la persona que nos ha traído hasta aquí... si es que tiene alguna». {n}Heinrix se niega a mirar a Idira a los ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me he... percatado de las idiosincrasias del sistema, sí. Aún no puedo determinar qué relación tiene con la persona que nos ha traído hasta aquí... si es que tiene alguna». {n}Heinrix se niega a mirar a Idira a los ojos.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我は…このシステムの特異性に気づいています。それが我らをここに引き寄せた人物とどのように関連しているのか…そもそも関連があるかどうかはまだ言えません」{n}ハインリックスはイディラと目を合わせるのをはっきりと拒否した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我は…このシステムの特異性に気づいています。それが我らをここに引き寄せた人物とどのように関連しているのか…そもそも関連があるかどうかはまだ言えません」{n}ハインリックスはイディラと目を合わせるのをはっきりと拒否した。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai... pris note des particularités du système, en effet. Cependant, je ne saurais dire en quoi elles sont liées à la personne qui nous a fait venir ici... si lien il y a. » {n}Heinrix refuse obstinément de croiser le regard d'Idira.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'ai... pris note des particularités du système, en effet. Cependant, je ne saurais dire en quoi elles sont liées à la personne qui nous a fait venir ici... si lien il y a. » {n}Heinrix refuse obstinément de croiser le regard d'Idira.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... habe die Merkwürdigkeiten im System bemerkt, ja. Aber ich kann noch nicht sagen, wie das alles mit der Person zusammenhängt, die uns hergebracht hat ... falls es überhaupt einen Zusammenhang gibt." {n}Heinrix vermeidet deutlich den Augenkontakt mit Idira.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... habe die Merkwürdigkeiten im System bemerkt, ja. Aber ich kann noch nicht sagen, wie das alles mit der Person zusammenhängt, die uns hergebracht hat ... falls es überhaupt einen Zusammenhang gibt." {n}Heinrix vermeidet deutlich den Augenkontakt mit Idira.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Sistemin... Kendine has niteliklerini fark ettim, evet. Henüz bizi buraya çekenle arasındaki bağlantıyı söyleyemem. Bağlantı varsa tabii." {n}Heinrix, İdira'yla göz göze gelmekten alenen kaçınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... have noted the system's idiosyncrasies, yes. I cannot yet say how it relates to the person who drew us here... if it is related at all." {n}Heinrix plainly refuses to meet Idira's eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sistemin... Kendine has niteliklerini fark ettim, evet. Henüz bizi buraya getiren kişiyle nasıl bir bağlantısı olduğunu söyleyemem. Bağlantısı varsa tabii." {n}Heinrix, İdira'yla göz göze gelmekten alenen kaçınıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
